content: @Chris Birkbeck @David Loeffler I am having a look at both PRs, but I think it is a good idea if you also have a look at each other's work.
Actually Chris has already given a positive review to #9666. I'm looking at #9783 now.
Yes I noticed, if it's still good for him we can merge it.
Yes I think its all good! (I'll also leave this comment on the PR)

I've left some comments on #9783. Please do try to get used to the mathlib code formatting conventions; it'll save a huge amount of tedious work both for your reviewers and for yourself if you can internalise where the spaces and brackets should go.
Great thank you! Yes I realise now that I'm terrible at this (specially now in Lean4)!
@Riccardo Brasca Chris and I have combined our efforts on #9783 and we now have a jointly-authored version. Can you please take another look at it?
I added a few style comments too
Yes I just saw them. I was a bit to hasty in r+ing. I'll go over the comments now.
David Loeffler has marked this topic as resolved.
Max R has marked this topic as unresolved.
Max R has marked this topic as resolved.
